name: The sun and the stars
description:
This game was made as part of Secret Samol 2019 (https://archiveofourown.org/collections/secretsamol2019/profile) for Skiaphilia (https://archiveofourown.org/users/skiaphilia). It is based on Marielda en Seasons of Hieron by Friends at the table (http://friendsatthetable.net). It contains spoilers for mayor events in both Marielda and Spring in Hieron.

Here is a walkthrough video if you are ever stuck in the game:
